Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: The student can draw two figures that are meant to represent people (basic shapes for heads and bodies, but lacking details).
The student might draw a line between the figures that could represent the string, but it may not connect to both figures consistently.
CANNOT: The student is unlikely to show an understanding of how the string telephone works to send messages (may not include cups or similar devices).
The student might not include features that represent sound traveling through the telephone (e.g., no indication of sound waves or vibrations).
The student may not demonstrate the concept of communication over a distance (string might be shown too short or incorrectly placed).
The student likely doesn't illustrate the idea of how this technology makes life easier or solves a problem (no context or explanation shown).
